name: Avalanche Race
description:
Run, an avalanche is coming! You need to go as fast as you can before the avalanche catches you.

A  platforming game made in 1 week for the Weekly Game Jam 240.

Controls:

  • Movement: Left and Right arrows / A and D
  • Roll on air: Down arrow / S / Space
  • Jump on floor: Down arrow / S / Space
  • Restart: R
  • Pause: Escape

Made by:

  • Marc González Estrada - kitoss
  • Arnau Albertí Serra - zooky12
